Replace.Text: The capital gains a Great Prophet and has the civilization's own [ICON_GreatSaints] saints, but other greats cannot be recruited. [NewLine] You can recruit a unique governor - Dawn. [NewLine] Loyalty of all cities is fixed at 100% [NewLine] Strategic resources +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith value. [NewLine] Capital Palace +1 [ICON_Faith] +1 Faith Value [ICON_Science] +1 Technology Value [ICON_Culture] Culture Value.

After a city leaves another civilization due to loss of loyalty, if it has the highest loyalty to Mainori every round, it will skip the stage of becoming a free city and directly join Mainori's civilization. [NewLine] +0.5 [ICON_Faith] per population.

The great ruler and prophet—Mainori! You have guided the direction of civilization for the planet Isaac after divine punishment, unified the world through religion, and led the newly born Silent Republic into the dazzling sea of ​​stars! May the Silent people always remember that destruction is rebirth!

Metal resources (iron, aluminum, uranium, copper, mercury, silver) +1 [ICON_Production] productivity. [NewLine] +0.5 [ICON_Production] productivity per population after researching industrialization technology.

The powerful, beautiful iron-fisted leader——Frawless! When the Silent civilization is about to fall apart, you take over the burden left by your partner and lead the Silent people to the future glory of the Apostle Empire. Your name will resound throughout the star sea! The glory is immortal and the apostle lives on forever!

Astrology is unlocked and replaces the special area of ​​the Holy Land. The productivity cost is reduced and the price hardly increases with technological advancement. [NewLine] has all-terrain [ICON_Faith] standard adjacency bonus for faith value, and will receive a large amount of adjacency bonus when adjacent to the Apostle Construction Center or Apostle Maintenance Cabin. In contrast, this area has no other adjacent bonuses. [NewLine] The city owning this area gets +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity when used as the starting point of a domestic trade route, and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold when used as the end of a domestic trade route Trade route end point +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith.

The bronze casting skill is unlocked and replaces the special area of ​​the industrial zone. The productivity cost is reduced and the price hardly increases with technological advancement. [NewLine] has an all-terrain [ICON_Production] standard adjacent bonus for productivity, and will receive a large additional adjacent bonus when adjacent to the Apostle Obelisk or Apostle Maintenance Cabin. In contrast, this area has no other adjacent bonuses. [NewLine] The city owning this area gets +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity when used as the starting point of a trade route, and +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Science] Science Value +1 when used as the end point of a domestic trade route [ ICON_Culture] Culture value, as the end point of foreign trade routes +1 [ICON_Production] productivity.

Urbanization is unlocked, replacing the characteristic areas of the community. Productivity costs are reduced and prices do not increase with technological advancement. Ignores cell charisma, fixed +8 [ICON_Housing] +8 [ICON_Food] food, and provides +2 [ICON_Food] food to adjacent cells (can only be obtained once per tile). [NewLine] has area defense and area control capabilities. [NewLine] The city owning this area gets +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity when used as the starting point of a trade route, and +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity when used as a domestic end point

Replaces the workshop's featured building with +2 [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] Provides an additional point of [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] Aluminum [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium per turn after completion
Feature building that replaces a shrine, +2 [ICON_GreatSaints] saint points.

Featured building that replaces the nuclear power plant, +16 [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] can more efficiently use [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] uranium to generate electricity. [NewLine] Its bonus extends to all city centers within 9 tiles (provided it does not already receive bonuses from other "power plant" buildings.)
Replaces temple features with +4 [ICON_GreatSaints] saint points. [NewLine]+1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic slot

Radio unlocked, Cilent's unique Civic Center building. [NewLine]+100% [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint points earned. [NewLine] Rewards a governor title, access to Atomic Power, and all [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] boosts from previous eras.

The characteristic building that replaces the monument, +1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] relic slot, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value, making this city's loyalty +2 each round. [NewLine] If the city's loyalty has reached the highest level, it will receive an additional +1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value +4 [ICON_Faith] faith value.
Unlocked by the Divine Right of Kings, Silent’s unique holy land building. [NewLine]+20% [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint points gained. +8 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +8 [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint points.

Featured building that replaces the Factory, +4 [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] Get a lot of additional output when the power supply is sufficient. [NewLine] The bonus extends to all city centers within 9 tiles (provided it does not already receive bonuses from other factory buildings.)

Silent features an industrial era melee unit. [NewLine] It is expensive and requires the Apostle Obelisk area to be produced or purchased. [NewLine] has strong combat power, high mobility, unique promotion route, and anti-aircraft capabilities. Maintenance fees are more expensive. [NewLine] Killing units in enemy cities will reduce the loyalty of their cities.
+8 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when in a formation, and formation units gain all [ICON_Movement] movement of accompanying units.
+1 vision range, vision can pass through forests, jungles and mountains, +8 [ICON_Strength] combat power when defending against long-range attacks.
+8 [ICON_Strength] combat strength in any situation, and an additional +16 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending against air.
Provides an additional +16 regeneration to nearby units within 1 tile, and can be regenerated after attacking.
Killing a unit will grant you +40 [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points.
+1 [ICON_Movement] movement, looting only requires 1 point of [ICON_Movement] movement.
+16 [ICON_Strength] combat power under any circumstances, +1 additional attack per round.

Silent features information age remote units. [NewLine] It is expensive and requires the Apostle Obelisk area to be produced or purchased. [NewLine] has extremely strong combat effectiveness, high mobility and unique promotion route, and can defend against air. Maintenance is extremely expensive. [NewLine] Killing units in enemy cities will reduce the loyalty of their cities.
+2 [ICON_Movement] movement, can climb cliffs, formation units gain all [ICON_Movement] movement of accompanying units.
+1 vision range, vision can pass through forests, jungles and mountains, can detect invisible units, +8 [ICON_Strength] combat power in any situation.
+16 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when within a formation, this unit can only be discovered by adjacent enemy units.
+16 [ICON_Strength] combat strength in any situation, and an additional +16 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending against air.
+2 [ICON_Movement] movement, only 1 point of [ICON_Movement] movement is consumed when passing through forests, jungles, hills and swamps.
Killing a unit will grant you +80 [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points.
+2 [ICON_Movement] movement, looting only requires 1 point of [ICON_Movement] movement.
+32 [ICON_Strength] combat strength under any circumstances, +1 additional attack per round.

Silent features great men. [NewLine] Every Silente person who bears the name of a saint played a pivotal role in every historical node before the Silente civilization entered the universe. The Apostle Empire will remember them until the truth about the gods is discovered.

The offline artificial intelligence of the self-proclaimed Apostle Empire Armory has traveled from the distant future to the present to help civilization survive or be glorious. [NewLine] She has powerful support abilities that can be a huge help to your civilization in almost every direction.
+100% combat experience for all units, +100% [ICON_Production] productivity when constructing barracks and buildings within them
Existing and newly built cities automatically receive ancient city walls and apostolic monuments
+1 [ICON_Science] technology +1 [ICON_Production] productivity per population, [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka +75% technology progress
+1 [ICON_Culture] culture value +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coins per population, [ICON_CivicBoosted] encouragement +75% municipal progress
Region-based item that provides [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn. Completion rewards [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] can only be performed once.
Divine punishment comes to the world

Zone-based item that provides [ICON_Faith] Faith per turn. Completion rewards [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] can only be performed once. [NewLine][NewLine]Unlock repeatable items upon completion[NewLine][NewLine]
Zone-based item that provides [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Gold] Gold per turn. Completion rewards [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] can only be performed once.
Zone-based item that provides [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Gold] Gold per turn. Completion rewards [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] can only be performed once.
Zone-based item that provides [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Gold] Gold per turn. Completion rewards [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points. [NewLine] can be repeated.
+6 [ICON_Faith] Faith from all adjacent terrain tiles.
+6 [ICON_Production] Faith from all adjacent terrain tiles.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith value comes from the adjacent Apostle building center cell.
+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture value comes from the center cell of the adjacent Apostle building.
+{1_num} [ICON_Science] The technology value comes from the center cell of the adjacent Apostle's construction.
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production comes from adjacent Apostle construction center cells.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith value comes from the adjacent Apostle Obelisk tile.
+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture value from adjacent Apostle Obelisk cell.
+{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science value comes from the adjacent Apostle Obelisk tile.
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from adjacent Apostle Obelisk tiles.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith value comes from the adjacent Apostle maintenance bay cell.
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from adjacent Apostle Maintenance Bay cells.
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food comes from adjacent Apostle Maintenance Bay cells.
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold coins come from adjacent Apostle maintenance cabin cells.
Gain +20% [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points, and gain [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Boosts from all Ancient and Classical periods.
Gain +20% [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points and +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all Pathfinders and Builders.
The selected [ICON_District] Apostle Obelisk immediately gains animistic dreamcatchers, and all animistic dreamcatchers have +0.5 [ICON_Culture] culture value + 0.5 [ICON_Science] technology value.

Gain +20% [ICON_GreatSaints] saint points, +2 [ICON_Movement] movement for religious units, missionaries and apostles can spread religion one additional time, +20 [ICON_Strength] combat power in theological wars.
Gain +20% [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points, and gain access to all medieval [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Boosts.
Gain [ICON_GreatSaints] +20% Saint Points. City religious pressure increased by +100%. Apostles automatically receive the martyr upgrade, and combat units gain +8 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Reward an [ICON_Governor] Governor title and receive two [ICON_Envoy] Envoys.

Obtain [ICON_GreatSaints] saint points +20%, and all units will automatically recover their lives after fighting. After killing the enemy, they will gain [ICON_Faith] faith value that is 100% of their [ICON_Strength] basic combat power and recover 32 [ICON_Damaged] lives.
Obtain [ICON_GreatSaints] saint points +20%, send envoys to give 400 points of religious pressure to the city-state, and increase the pressure of religious spread in neighboring cities by 800%.
Obtain [ICON_GreatSaints] +20% saint points, +2 vision for all units, and combat units ignore damage debuffs.
Get an Apostle and receive a random Renaissance Municipal.
Obtain [ICON_GreatSaints] saint points +40%, [ICON_Gold] gold coins and strategic resource cost for upgrading combat units -50%, and killing units in enemy cities reduces city loyalty.

The selected [ICON_District] Apostle Obelisk immediately gains the Animistic Dream Catcher and Flow Broadening, and all flow widenings gain +0.5 [ICON_Culture] Culture Value + 0.5 [ICON_Science] Science and Technology Value.
Gain +40% Saint Points from [ICON_GreatSaints], and gain [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Boosts from all industrial eras.
Gain [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint points +40%, domestic city espionage level -4.
Selected [ICON_District] colleges get immediate access to libraries, universities, and research labs.
The selected [ICON_District] Apostle Construction Center immediately obtains a metal printing plant, a material synthesis plant, and an energy conversion plant.
Obtain [ICON_GreatSaints] Saint Points +40%, and the accumulated war-weariness is reduced by 100% than usual.
Diplomatic Visibility +2, your spy can choose any available upgrade.
Get two random technologies and municipalities.
